}}'''Amrothos''' was the third son of [[Imrahil]] of [[Dol Amroth]].

==History==
He was born in {{TA|2994}}. He had one younger sister, [[Lothíriel]] and two older brothers; [[Elphir]] and [[Erchirion]].<ref>{{PM|Elendil}}, ''The Line of Dol Amroth'', p. 221</ref>

==Etymology==
''Amrothos'' seems to be a [[Sindarin]] name. Its meaning is not glossed, but it could mean "Terror of Amroth" and be a compound of the name ''[[Amroth]]'' and ''gos'' ("dread", "terror").<ref>{{HM|GS}}, entry '''Amrothos''', p. 340</ref>
